system.note:
Has Three Autogun Magazines (each containing 20 rounds and requiring a Full Action to Reload) and a Fire Selector to switch between them.
Has an Undermounted Shotgun (see [Shotgun] Profile). Can only fire as either an [Autogun] or [Shotgun] at once.

description.value: Note: Has Three Autogun Magazines (each containing 20 rounds and requiring a Full Action to Reload) and a Fire Selector to switch between them. Has an Undermounted Shotgun (see [Shotgun] Profile). Can only fire as either an [Autogun] or [Shotgun] at once.
